title: One wild ride
creator_credit: Hal Roach Studios, Hal Roach and Robert F. McGowan
brief_description: Part of the “Our Gang” series. A comic tale of a taxi ride that ends up out of control. Cast includes Farina Hoskins, Mickey Daniels, Mary Kornman, Joe Cobb, Jackie Condon.
